meanings.definition: To fill with awe or wonder.
meanings.sent1: The breathtaking view of the sunset was aweing.
meanings.sent2: The grand fireworks display was truly aweing.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was so aweing that everyone gasped.
meanings.sent4: The majestic waterfall was aweing in its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected kindness of strangers can be truly aweing.

meanings.definition: The feeling of reverence, respect, and wonder inspired by something majestic or beautiful.
meanings.sent1: The majestic mountain evoked a sense of aweing in the hikers.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the starry night sky filled her with aweing.
meanings.sent3: The child's innocent wonder at the butterfly was pure aweing.
meanings.sent4: The grandeur of the cathedral left visitors in a state of aweing.
meanings.sent5: The natural wonders of the world never fail to inspire aweing in us.
